headings.usage: Main headlines, section titles. Use uppercase for maximum impact.

ui.usage: Data points, confidence scores, button labels, technical specs.

primary.description: Safety Orange - used for CTAs and critical alerts

accent.description: HUD Cyan - used for AI vision overlays, scanning lines, and tech accents

layout.spacing: Generous. Use p-12, p-24 for section gaps. p-6, p-8 for internal card padding.

HeroSection.structure: Split layout or Centered with massive visual.
HeroSection.visual: Background image of construction site with animated 'scanning' overlay (cyan lines, bounding boxes).
HeroSection.typography: H1: text-6xl md:text-8xl font-heading uppercase tracking-tighter. Sub: text-xl text-muted-foreground.

FeatureGrid.structure: Bento Grid. Mix of large cards (2x2) and smaller detail cards (1x1).
FeatureGrid.style: Glassmorphism cards (bg-slate-900/50 backdrop-blur-md) with 1px border (border-slate-800). Hover: border-cyan-500/50.

HowItWorks.structure: Step-by-step vertical timeline or horizontal process cards.

ViolationDemo.features: Hovering over image reveals bounding boxes with confidence scores (e.g., 'No Helmet: 98%').

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle grid pattern overlay (opacity 0.05) on background.
effects: Scan Line: Animated vertical line moving across images.
Glass: Backdrop blur for sticky nav and floating cards.

media.icons: Lucide React (Shield, Eye, FileText, AlertTriangle, CheckCircle, Upload)

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is white/off-white on dark backgrounds. Use bold weights for colored text.
accessibility.aria: Use aria-label for icon-only buttons. Alt text for all images.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'HeroSection' with the 'scan-line-effect' class on the image wrapper.
Use 'Barlow Condensed' for all headings to give that industrial/warning sign feel.
Ensure the 'Upload' area looks like a technical drop zone (dashed border, mono text).
For the 'ViolationDemo', create a component that overlays absolute positioned divs (bounding boxes) on the image.
Do not use generic gradients. Use the 'grid-pattern' class defined in index.css for backgrounds.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
